name: Milkshake
tag_list: good, design, shopping, travel, eco, food, give-back, causes, cause
overview:
Milkshake is a daily edition of good finds that give back. Through its hallmark daily email and growing online communities, Milkshake invites readers to discover products, people, causes and companies that are making a difference, then inspires them to take action. Read about a chic watch made of recycled wood then click to buy and support a tree-planting initiative; learn about an organization that is selling gum and mints to fund the education of children in Africa; make your next deluxe vacation matter and spend a day volunteering to protect Leatherback turtle hatchlings in Australia from extinction. Presented in compact, upbeat editorial tidbits, Milkshake is making it easy (and fun!) to be a part of all thatâ€™s good.

Milkshake Manifesto Milkshake was founded based on the belief that it is better to support products, initiatives, events and services that not only are innovative, unique and desired, but that also give back at the same time. Our mission is to put â€˜giving backâ€™ in the context of the larger world we live in: discovering ways to shop, travel, eat, read and interact with greater purpose. Our ultimate goal is to give readers a daily find that dazzles and initiates change, inspiring them to be part of all thatâ€™s good.
